document_data.name: The Sentinel
document_data.mainbody: '''The Sentinel''' was a mysterious figure who oversaw the [[Temple of Mystra (Elventree)|Temple of Mystra]] in [[Elventree]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: The Sentinel wore at mask at all times to hide his appearance and muffle his voice.
document_data.Activities: The Sentinel was a skilled [[wizard]]. Though all were allowed to use the special spellcasting chamber within the temple, evil-doers were watched closely by the Sentinel. He had a knack for knowing the hearts of any who visited the temple.
